text: are you curious about the Expressions
you can use to catch your crush's
attention and leave them wanting more Dr
Helen Fisher a biological Anthropologist
and expert on human attraction and love
believes that expressing your feelings
to a crush can be positive and
empowering even if it doesn't work out
the way you hoped in her book anatomy of
love she explains that romantic love can
motivate us to take risks and pursue
meaningful connections Dr Fisher
suggests that by being true to yourself
you can open the door to personal growth
and a fulfilling relationship with that
said here are the phrases that can melt
your crush's heart
I just wanted to take a moment to tell
you how much you mean to me every time
I'm with you I feel like the luckiest
person in the world
aside drifts off to sleep a notification
lights up his phone it's a message from
his admirers expressing how much he
means to them
even though they know he's asleep they
took the time to send a heartfelt
message it's moments like these that
makes I feel cherished
how can you convey your emotions to
someone in a way that is both powerful
and vulnerable
expressing affection and admiration for
someone can create a sense of closeness
and intimacy Dr Sue Johnson a clinical
psychologist and expert on romantic love
and relationships suggests that
communicating your feelings can help to
build a stronger bond between you and
your partner this phrase can communicate
your emotions in a clear and honest way
allowing you to create a deeper sense of
connection and possibly even strengthen
your relationship so how can we use this
phrase to convey our feelings and show
our appreciation for someone we care
about
feel an amazing energy about you that
I'm drawn to I don't know what it is but
whenever we're together I Feel Like
Anything is Possible
have you ever met someone who just
seemed to radiate positive energy and
make you feel more alive that's exactly
how Psy felt when he met his Crush from
the very beginning there was a magnetic
quality to their connection that was
hard to explain it was as if their
energy Fields were perfectly aligned and
complemented each other Dr John gottman
a psychologist who has studied romantic
relationships suggests that expressing
fondness and admiration can help build a
stronger emotional connection with your
partner expressing admiration for
someone's positive qualities and the
effect they have on you can be a
powerful way to connect with them as it
shows that you see and appreciate them
for who they truly are my sigh
acknowledging his crush's positive
energy and expressing how it made him
feel he was able to deepen their
connection and start a relationship
based on mutual respect and admiration
I know we've only known each other for a
short time but there's something about
you that just speaks to me I feel like I
can be myself around you
have you ever felt at home with someone
as soon as I met his Crush he knew there
was something special between them it
was like their souls were calling out to
each other and he couldn't resist the
pull they talked for hours and the more
they spoke the more they realized what
they had in common it was like they'd
known each other for years and as they
continue to date their connection only
grew they could finish each other's
sentences and knew what the other was
thinking before they even said it it was
like they were in their own little world
and nothing else mattered as human
beings we all desire to feel like we
belong and that our presence is valued
by others
there's something special about being
able to let our guard down and show our
true selves to someone else without fear
of judgment this experience can be
life-changing providing a deep sense of
validation and significance
Dr Bernie Brown who is well-versed in
the complexities of human emotions
believes that this connection with
others is the foundation of our
existence in her words connection is
what brings us to life
it is the Cornerstone of our purpose and
the reason we find meaning in our lives
